p: Climate change projection for P. papatasi showed that the species will shift northward, with a centroid shift estimated at 292, 595 and 948 km for the time periods 2020, 2050 and 2080, respectively, under the A2a (pessimistic) scenario (Table 1). Similar trends were observed for the B2a scenario. However, the shift of the centroid of the suitable area for P. papatasi occurrence was lower, with a maximum shift of 728 km northward suspected to occur in 2080.
